title: @Riot KateyKhaos, What Is the Snowdown Shop Issue?

replies.body: We're trying to work out issues that were preventing some players from receiving all of their offers.
Ah, thank you :D I'm very glad you are fixing it then!!! Thanks so much!
Of course. Sorry for the delay on this!
Since the snowdown shop is already released, I still only have 5 offers x.x  Can this still be fixed??
We're starting to roll out now, region by region.
Gotta love the copy-paste for efficiency :D Thanks so much!
